body.p: The range IP must be defined for network discovery and SNMP inventory by the agents.

ul.li: Start of IP range : First IP address of the range
End of IP range: Last IP address of the range
Entity : Associate this range IP to an entity

body.note: When validate, a verification of IP is made and a message appear if there is a problem.

section.title: Tab Permanent task - discovery (SNMP)
section.p: This tab is used to create a netdiscovery task easily.
Clic on link Create task easily to create the task. After configuration is required. For configuration, see .
In this tab, history and complete logs of last executions is displayed.

section.title: Tab Permanent task - inventory (SNMP)
section.p: This tab is used to create an inventory (SNMP) task easily. See section before Tab Permanent task - discovery (SNMP).
